data.title: Venetia Stevenson obituary
data.meta_description: Venetia Stevenson may have been one of the most promising young actresses of the late 1950s, but for a while she was better known for an off-screen role: as
data.text:
Venetia Stevenson may have been one of the most promising young actresses of the late 1950s, but for a while she was better known for an off-screen role: as girlfriend to two of Hollywood’s secretly gay stars, Tab Hunter and Anthony Perkins. The two actors were in a relationship but lived in constant fear of being exposed by the tabloid magazines.

“Tab and Tony and I went out together,” Stevenson said in a 2015 documentary, Tab Hunter Confidential, explaining her role as “beard”. “I knew the game and we were playing it. In the fan magazines there’d be a picture of Tab and I and then on the next page there’d be a picture of Tony and I doing something else but never just
